default.title: SPPU Codes - OOP
default.description: SPPU Codes: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) exercises for SPPU students. Learn C++ programming concepts like operator overloading, inheritance, file handling, STL, and more.
default.keywords: C++, OOP, SPPU Codes, programming exercises, operator overloading, inheritance, STL, file handling

questions.title: Q1: Implement a class Complex which represents the Complex Number data type.
questions.description: SPPU Codes: Implement a class Complex which represents the Complex Number data type. Learn operator overloading, constructors, and more in C++.
questions.keywords: C++, OOP, complex number, operator overloading, constructors, SPPU Codes

questions.title: Q2: Develop a program in C++ to create a database of students information system.
questions.description: SPPU Codes: Develop a program in C++ to create a database of students information system. Learn constructors, destructors, dynamic memory allocation, and exception handling.
questions.keywords: C++, OOP, student database, constructors, destructors, dynamic memory allocation, exception handling, SPPU Codes

questions.title: Q3: Create a class called Publication and derive Book and Tape classes from it.
questions.description: SPPU Codes: Create a class called Publication and derive Book and Tape classes from it. Learn inheritance and exception handling in C++.
questions.keywords: C++, OOP, inheritance, publication class, book class, tape class, exception handling, SPPU Codes

questions.title: Q4: Write a C++ program that creates an output file, writes information to it, and reads from it.
questions.description: SPPU Codes: Write a C++ program that creates an output file, writes information to it, and reads from it. Learn file handling in C++.
questions.keywords: C++, OOP, file handling, input file, output file, SPPU Codes

questions.title: Q5: Write a function template for selection sort that inputs, sorts, and outputs an integer array and a float array.
questions.description: SPPU Codes: Write a function template for selection sort that inputs, sorts, and outputs an integer array and a float array. Learn templates in C++.
questions.keywords: C++, OOP, selection sort, function template, integer array, float array, SPPU Codes

questions.title: Q6: Write a C++ program using STL for sorting and searching user-defined records.
questions.description: SPPU Codes: Write a C++ program using STL for sorting and searching user-defined records. Learn STL and vector containers in C++.
questions.keywords: C++, OOP, STL, sorting, searching, vector container, user-defined records, SPPU Codes

questions.title: Q7: Write a C++ program to use the map associative container for state populations.
questions.description: SPPU Codes: Write a C++ program to use the map associative container for state populations. Learn map containers and error handling in C++.
questions.keywords: C++, OOP, map container, associative container, state populations, error handling, SPPU Codes
